title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 151.4 - Penalty
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 151.4 - Penalty

State Regulations
A penalty shall be withheld, and paid to the trust fund, from
any early withdrawal from an account, in an amount equal to ten percent of the
portion of the withdrawal constituting earnings, except for withdrawals made as
a result of the death or disability of a designated beneficiary or a withdrawal
made on account of a scholarship awarded to the designated
beneficiary. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2

151.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
